name: Flying Santa - North Pole Tracker Game!
name_original: Flying Santa - North Pole Tracker Game!
description:
One of the best Christmas games you will find for 2014! Celebrate this Christmas holiday with this amazing, SUPER addictive, and fun game!

Fly with Santa Claus in his sleigh (led by Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer of course). Watch out for the tricky obstacles, and deliver all the presents on Christmas Eve!

This a very simple and addictive game that both kids and adults will enjoy playing for hours this Christmas season. You won't be able to put it down!

HOW TO PLAY

- Tap the screen repeatedly to make Santa fly!
- Watch out for the obstacles, or Santa's sleigh will crash!
- See how far you can get to achieve a high score!

Share your high scores on Facebook and Twitter with all your friends this Christmas!
